origination.corpname: Pennsylvania Governor's Commission to Revise the Public Employe Law of Pennsylvania

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Senate Bill no. 355, Public Employee Relations Bill and Senate Bill no. 518, Senate Bill no. 1021 and House Bill NO. 1443 - Public Employes Relations Bill - May 23, June 11, August 21 & 22, 1969.

scopecontent.p: Senate Bill no. 355, Public Employee Relations Bill and Senate Bill no. 518, Senate Bill no. 1021 and House Bill NO. 1443 - Public Employes Relations Bill - May 23, June 11, August 21 & 22, 1969. These Bills support Public Employees rights to organize, form, join or assist in employee organizations and to select representatives for the primary purpose of collective bargaining.

controlaccess.corpname: Pennsylvania. Governor's Commission for Revision of Pennsylvania's Public Employee Law
